author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess.

newsMedieval:
In mountains high, ascends the fleet,
A sport, skyrunning, doth they greet,
Endurance great, as gods of old,
Upward they climb, ambitious bold.

A test of wit, ordeals 'bout,
Events report, put in a joust,
Wisdom be gained from hollow'd page,
Mark The Wall Street Journal's sage.

Now hearst, of fjords I speak no more,
But countless shores of foreign lore,
In paradisal climes they flee,
Where gold is spent as brisk as sea.

feedItems.title: The Fast-Growing Sport Where You Run Up a Mountain for 50 Miles
feedItems.description: A cadre of hard-core endurance athletes are embracing skyrunning, which focuses on how high you can run instead of how far.

feedItems.title: News Quiz for April 22, 2023
feedItems.description: Test your knowledge of the week’s events as reported in The Wall Street Journal.

feedItems.title: Americans Escaping Pricey Cities Bring Higher Inflation With Them
feedItems.description: Inflation in some warm-weather metro areas is more than 2 percentage points higher than the national rate.

author.name: Conchobar mac Nessa
author.description: An Irish bard who doth sing of the battles and triumphs of his people, preserving their traditions and history.

newsMedieval:
In Treasury's halls of gilded trade,
A great divergence was displayed.
Betwixt one-month and three, behold!
The largest gap in records old.

As men escape th' expensive town,
To warmer climes they bear the crown
Of highest costs, inflation near,
Two points above th' national sphere.

Now hasten, Swift charg'd wains contend
In mining deals ne'er seen, my friend!
The race for metals in ascendance
For cars electric and green transcendence.

feedItems.title: Debt-Ceiling Standoff Warps Treasury Trading
feedItems.description: The divergence between one-month and three-month bills is the largest on record.

feedItems.title: Americans Escaping Pricey Cities Bring Higher Housing Costs, Inflation With Them
feedItems.description: Inflation in some warm-weather metro areas is more than 2 percentage points higher than the national rate.

feedItems.title: Rise of EVs Drives Mining Deals to Decade High
feedItems.description: Mining companies are back at the deals table as they battle for control of commodities essential for making electric cars and renewable-energy infrastructure.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A troubadour from Occitania who doth compose songs of love and chivalry, enchanting all who hear her voice.

newsMedieval:
Upon the border of two realms so fierce,
In Arctic domain of ice, a frost doth pierce,
Norway and Moscow, tensions mount and swell,
As Europe's doors close to Russians’ knell.

In swift succession, noble Musk did play,
Risk's anxious hand upon life’s stage, in one short day,
Twitter, Tesla, SpaceX felt his might,
His reputation's reigniting set alight.

And foul winds blow through regions' banks afar,
Eleven's grace hath fallen, like lone star,
As Moody's downgrades darken Western skies,
Silicon's demise now catches all eyes.

feedItems.title: Chill Settles In at a Europe-Russia Border Crossing
feedItems.description: High above the Arctic Circle, Norway maintains frosty relations with Moscow, even as most other countries in Europe have closed their doors to most Russians since the invasion of Ukraine.

feedItems.title: In 24 Hours, Musk Reignited His Reputation for Risk
feedItems.description: The billionaire entrepreneur had a dramatic week with moves at Twitter, Tesla and SpaceX.

feedItems.title: Moody's Downgrades 11 Regional Banks, Including Zions, U.S. Bank, Western Alliance
feedItems.description: The recent failures of Silicon Valley Bank and Signature have focused attention on regional lenders’ weaknesses.
